title: Plank-Wood Flooring, Double Sinks, Microwave, Soaker Tub
neighborhood: West Olympia, Captial Mall, Yauger Park
posting_body: A welcome retreat is waiting for you at Woodland Apartments.
Located in Olympia, Washington, we offer spacious studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments for rent near Capital Mall.
Our pet-friendly community is ideal for those seeking to find balance between their professional and personal lives.
As a resident, you’ll love living close to downtown, yet far enough away to enjoy the peace and quiet the Pacific Northwest is known for.
Fully Covered Patio or Balcony with Attached Storage
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
We accept up to two cats or two dogs only.
If over 25 lbs, must reside on ground floor apartment home and will require an additional deposit/fee.
Prices change daily and are subject to change based on availability, your preferred move in date and lease terms.
Price listed does not include utilities, pet rent, insurance, or other fees which may be applicable.
Please contact the Woodland Apartments for full pricing details.
